feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX7][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 6, 03:00 - 07:00 UTC

Jun 13, 21:46 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/07/2023 03:00 UTC
End time : 06/07/2023 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [BHS1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam
entry.content:
Jun 13, 20:42 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/06/2023 18:07 UTC
End Time : 13/06/2023 20:30 UTC
Service impact : Some customers didn't have access to Veeam service in BHS1
Root cause : Hardware issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 13, 19:47 UTC
Identified - Start time : 13/06/2023 18:07 UTC
Service impact : Some customers can't access Veeam service in BHS1
Root cause : Hardware issue
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] – NSX , vCenter, Zerto & ESXi major upgrade
entry.content:
Jun 12, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 9, 17:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/06/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 22/07/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : During NSX upgrade , Hosts will be put in maintenance mode and reboot
During vSphere and Zerto migrations , management will be inaccessible for 3 hours.
During ESXi migrations , In some case Binaries will be pushed locally or Hosts will be rebooted, (no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service

entry.title: [BHS/ERI/LIM/SBG/WAW/RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Licensing
entry.content:
Jun 9, 12:21 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/06/2023 00:00 UTC
End Time : 08/06/2023 15:00 UTC
Current Status : No more issue with the Veeam licensing. All services are operational.
Root cause: : Current license entered into Grace Period.

Jun 7, 15:51 UTC
Update - Renewal are on going with our partner.
Our teams are working on the issue.
Update will be post has significant progress is made.

Jun 2, 08:49 UTC
Identified - Start time: 01/06/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : We are in the process of renewing the Veeam licensing, but due to some issues, we entered into a Grace Period.
You may experience some issues to get new licenses from our Veeam Enterprise offer, and messages speaking about Grace Period.
This isn’t impacting our Managed Veeam Backup offer.
Ongoing Actions: We are working the renewal with our partner, we expect to receive the new license in the following days.
Root cause: : Current license entered into Grace Period.
